GKGDescription: Returns any mention of a major recognized drug cartel
Returns any mention of a major infectious disease
Returns any mention of a major ethnicity from around the world (expands CAMEOETH)
Returns any mention of a "functional actor", which is essentially a "role" from a "child" to a "burgler" to get a better understanding of the specific roles of people involved
Captures a cross-section of major food staples like bread, rice, etc
Returns any mention of a major military title such as Captain, 1st Lieutenant, etc
Returns any mention of a major recognized political party around the world
Returns any mention of a major religion from around the world (expands CAMEOREL)
Returns mentions of special issues such as certain major laws and will eventually be replaced by a new tracking system for those
Special kinds of death such as beheadings
Returns any mention of a major recognized terror group around the world
